top.name: Joshua
top.goal: My goal is to be a versatile software developer that can tackle problems effectively.

skills: Work collaboratively within a team environment
Willing to take the lead to solve problems
Excellent project management and organizational skills

deliAssociate.description: As a deli associate, I serve and maintain meat, cheese, and hot food for customers, while also keeping the area clean and stocking displayed food items. I am responsible for food sales, compliance to regulations, and customer service.

indianaAcademy.where: Indiana Academy for the Science, Mathematics, and Humanities
indianaAcademy.description: At Indiana Academy, the number one school in Indiana, I went through a rigorous college-level course load while staying on-campus as a dorm student. The school encouraged time management, task prioritization, and excellence through the combination of high school and college lifestyles and coursework.

UVU.description: Current GPA: 3.8/4. Planned emphasis: security, game design, and networking. Capstone project TBD.

activities: To be determined: LEAD program (Learn Engage Acquire Discover), https://www.uvu.edu/leadership/
I have an interest in Japanese through language class and Japanese Club.
I am familiar with user interfaces and logical sequencing through gaming simulations.
